LanguageData.CheatMenu.Shared.Message.NoThings: No things found on that cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnThing.Label: Spawn Thing
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnThing.Description: Select a ThingDef, choose stack size (if stackable), then place it on the map.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.SelectWindow.Title: Select Thing To Spawn
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.SelectWindow.Search: Search by ThingDef label or defName.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.StackWindow.Title: Select Stack Count
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.Message.PlaceFailed: Could not place {0} at that location.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.PawnResurrection.Label: Resurrect Pawns
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.PawnResurrection.Descrip: Select a map cell and resurrect all corpses on that cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnResurrection.Message.NoCor: No corpses found on that cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.PawnHealRandomInjury10.D: Select a pawn or cell, then heal one random healable injury by 10 on each targeted pawn.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnHealRandomInjury10.Message: Select a pawn or map cell for {0}. Right-click to stop targeting.
No pawns found at the selected target.
No healable injuries found on the selected pawns.

LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.PawnGiveAbility.Label: Give Ability
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.PawnGiveAbility.Descript: Select an ability (or all), then target pawn(s) to grant it.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnGiveAbility.Window.Title: Select Ability
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnGiveAbility.Window.SearchT: Search by ability label or defName.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnGiveAbility.Message.Select: Select a pawn or map cell for {0}. Right-click to stop targeting.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnGiveAbility.Message.NoPawn: No pawns found at the selected target.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnGiveAbility.Message.NoAbil: No selected pawns can receive abilities.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.PawnAddGene.Label: Add Gene
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.PawnAddGene.Description: Select gene category and gene, then target pawn(s) to add it.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnAddGene.Window.Title: Select Gene
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnAddGene.Window.SearchToolt: Search by gene label or defName.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnAddGene.Message.SelectPawn: Select a pawn or map cell for {0}. Right-click to stop targeting.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnAddGene.Message.NoPawn: No pawns found at the selected target.

LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.PawnGiveTrait.Label: Give Trait
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.PawnGiveTrait.Descriptio: Select a trait/degree, then target a pawn to apply it.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnGiveTrait.Window.Title: Select Trait
LanguageData.CheatMenu.PawnGiveTrait.Window.SearchToo: Search by trait label, defName, or degree.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralDestroy.Label: Destroy
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralDestroy.Descripti: Destroy all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralKill.Label: Kill
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralKill.Description: Kill all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.DoIncident.Label: Do Incident
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.DoIncident.Description: Open a searchable list of incidents and execute one immediately.
